amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that no funding will be authorized to carry out the requirements of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 243 (Roll no. 106).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 243 (Roll no. 106).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Plaskett.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
